long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Maximize your team’s performance with 2 Minute Warning’s Chrome extension. Submit game film directly from Hudl for fast, AI-powered analysis and breakdowns delivered within the hour.

Our cutting-edge artificial intelligence system provides detailed data, reports, and scout cards, helping coaches quickly identify key plays and improve strategy. It’s easy to use—just upload your footage, and we take care of the rest.

Key Features:
•	Quick, AI-powered game analysis delivered in under an hour.
•	Simple submission process—send game film directly from Hudl.
•	Actionable data and insights to improve your team’s strategy fast.

For more details and to see how 2 Minute Warning can help you win, visit www.2MW.ai
